title: Neural Network Laboratory - Modular Arithmetic Study
prompt: Welcome to the laboratory. Here we explore how neural networks learn and preserve algebraic structures in modular arithmetic, with a focus on homomorphic property preservation in neural network training.

create.help: Creates new model configuration. Without args, enters interactive mode.

train.help: Trains specified model or lists available models for training.

analyze.help: Performs comprehensive analysis. Generates visualizations and metrics.

test.help: Test modular addition. Direct input or interactive mode.

list.description: List all models and their status
list.help: Shows available models, training status, and configuration.

export.help: Exports model, results, and visualizations to specified format.

help.help: Displays detailed usage information for specified command.

exit.help: Saves any pending changes and exits.
